item.title: Rapid prototyping & Angie & Slack application
item.description: We’re trying new ideas for our startupÂ and they need to be tested quickly. With real users. We’re just connecting available dots without reinventing the wheel if there’s existing solution for particular problem. Here’s an example what we just did in a few days. Our flagship Frank is well accepted by customers. They like it, because it’s simple (survey with five questions) and it gives them good results. When compared to another performance review tools (like 360, etc.
